//"Winter is coming"

#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#include<math.h>
#include<complex>
#include<string>
#define uint unsigned int
#define ll long long int
#define MOD 1000000007
#define lld long long int
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pb(x) push_back(x)
using namespace std;
       int a[10000]={0};
int res[10][4001];
void solve()
{
    for(int i=0;i<=9;i++)
     {
       res[i][0]=1;
       }
  for(int i=1;i<=9;i++)
    {    int  x;
          int carry=0;
         int count_digit=1;
          a[0]=1;
           for(int k=1;k<=4000;k++)
              {
                for(int j=0;j<count_digit;j++)
              {     x=(a[j]*i)+carry;
                   a[j]=x%10;
                  carry=x/10;

               }
           while(carry>0)
             {
                a[count_digit]=carry%10;
                carry=carry/10;
                count_digit++;
              }
        ll sum=0;
         for(int l=count_digit-1;l>=0;l--)
        {sum+=a[l];}
        res[i][k]=sum;
    }

          }




    }


int main()
{ unsigned int T;
cin>>T;
solve();
for(int c=1;c<=T;c++)
{ unsigned int a1,b;
cin>>a1>>b;
cout<<"Case "<<c<<": "<<res[a1][b]<<endl;



}





}
